name: Stockholm Syndrome (bartsilver, Jaczkulinek, stwobi)
description:
I am an honorable man from a small city... For decades I have built my reputation as a good neighborhood man. After years,  my sister came to my door one night... Dirty, broken, a drug addict... a disgrace for my family. In the first few seconds of anger and fear I took her to my basement... too late, now that I have my mind clear I see my mistake. If someone notices, police will come for me... my only chance is to cure her

Help her stay calm and silent trought 3 phase drug withdrawal.
How to play:

Click room (mouse wheel to zoom out)
find the objects 
go to basement
click to item in inventory
click to "sister" 
Watch what the item is doing to her...
